name: Progression (Noxity Labs)
description:
!!! DISCLAIMER !!! The regular version of the game required a fairly decent computer to run as it can get a bit graphically demanding. If you have performance issues with it please try the performance version, and if you use a low-end GPU or integrated graphics card use the super performance version.

Read about potential issues down below.

A short game about failing, progressing and some... weird things.

Made for the Wowie Jam 3

Currently Windows 64-bit only, created using a lite version of the Nautilus X technology stack in Unity.

Troubleshooting (this will be updated over time) :

  • The game doesn't start : Try running the exe in /bin/build_shipping
